ThingDef.label: animal archotech leg
ThingDef.description: An animal archotech leg. It looks and feels like natural flesh, but it can make the animal move lightning fast, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: animal archotech arm
ThingDef.description: An animal archotech arm. Strong enough to crush a thick hardwood branch in its hand, and precise enough to write a sonnet on a grain of rice. It looks and feels like natural flesh, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.

ThingDef.label: animal archotech tail
ThingDef.description: An animal archotech tail. Indistinguishable from a natural tail, while at the same time providing the animal with a surge of speed and agility.

ThingDef.label: animal synaptic reinforcer
ThingDef.description: An animal archotech implant that enhances neural connections, improving cognitive functions such as memory, learning, and response times, basically healing the brain and allowing the animal improved function.
